title: Individual Customer Accounts and Suitability
description: Account opening requirements, customer identification, privacy regulations, trading authorizations, suitability obligations, and senior investor protections

sections.title: Customer Accounts for Individuals
topics: USA PATRIOT Act and Anti-Money Laundering
Accounts for Employees of Other Firms

learning_objectives: Identify required and optional information for new account forms
Explain customer identification program requirements under the USA PATRIOT Act
Understand anti-money laundering procedures including SARs, CTRs, and MILs
Distinguish between discretionary and non-discretionary trading authority
Apply the three components of FINRA suitability obligations
Explain Regulation Best Interest and its four obligations
Understand account maintenance requirements including confirmations and statements
Identify senior investor protections and trusted contact requirements
author: Franklin Hugh Money
